mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_info ( user_id, passwd, user_name, email, user_level, point, cellphone, birth, reg_dt, total_pay ) VALUES ( #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{passwd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'1234'), #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NVL(#{userLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'BASIC'), NVL(#{point,jdbcType=NUMERIC},0), #{cellphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{birth,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE, NVL(#{totalPay,jdbcType=NUMERIC},0) )
mapper.select: SELECT user_id as userId, passwd, user_name as userName, email, user_level as userLevel, point, cellphone, birth, reg_dt as regDt FROM user_info WHERE user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
